###############
 show_db_entry
###############

Show full description file for a given simulation stored in ITER DB
folder

**********************
 Syntax show_db_entry
**********************

   .. command-output:: show_db_entry -h

***********************
 Example show_db_entry
***********************

.. code-block:: bash

   $ show_db_entry -p 134174 -r 117
   # ------------------------------------------------------------------
   # Status is "draft" when auto-generated by the create_yam function,
   # to be changed to "active" once simulation and yaml files are ready
   # to be changed to "obsolete" if the simulation becomes obsolete
   # ------------------------------------------------------------------
   status:
       active

   # -----------------------------------------------
   # Reference name describing the simulation
   # -----------------------------------------------
   reference_name:
       DINA-JINTRAC free bnd. core-edge-SOL transp. ITER 5.3 MA 5.3 T DT Baseline Current ramp-up, FEC 2018

   # ---------------------------------------------------------
   # Responsible officer name(s), can be separated by comas
   # ---------------------------------------------------------
   responsible_name:
       Florian Koechl, Maksim Dubrov, Victor Lukash et al.
